sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './filters.css'; class Filters extends React.Component{ handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const data = { city: this.state.city, price_min: this.state.price_min, price_max: this.state.price_max, bed_min: this.state.bed_min, bed_max: this.state.bed_max, room_min: this.state.room_min, room_max: this.state.room_max, no_filters: this.state.no_filters, }; this.props.updateGalleryItems(data) }; handleChange = (e) => { const {name, value} = e.target; this.setState({ [name] : value, }); const data = { [name]:value, }; this.props.updateGalleryItems(data) }; render() { return(

) } } export default Filters;
